resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Register here
There is already a user with that name
Username can have only alphanumerical characters and the following symbols: "-._@+", and must be between 2 and 50 characters long
Password must be at least 6 characters long, and have at least one digit, one symbol, and one lowercase character
It is likely that the request failed due to poor or no internet. The application needs internet to function. Ensure internet connection to keep using it
Translate from spoken romanian to sign language
Translate from sign language to spoken romanian
Ensure you have the latest updates available
The application needs to download some files to function. Depending on your internet speed, it might take up to half an hour. Please press "OK" when you are ready
To function, the application needs to record audio. Please press on "Permissions" -> "Microphone" and choose the first option
To function, the application needs to record video. Please press on "Permissions" -> "Camera" and choose the first option
